tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES website_content(content_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username STRING,
    email STRING,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title STRING,
    content TEXT,
    user_id INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content TEXT,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE categories (
    category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE tags (
    tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING
)
